original_title: DMASL to host Sri Lanka digital marketing Summit 2023 powered by Dialog
original_body_lines: The Digital Marketing Association of Sri Lanka (DMASL), the professional body for digital marketers in Sri Lanka along with Dialog Axiata PLC, Sri Lanka’s premier connectivity provider, announced plans to host ‘The Sri Lanka Digital Marketing Summit 2023’ on the 4th of July, at Taj Samudra Colombo.

The theme for this year’s summit will be ‘The Lankan Revival: Unleashing the Power of Digital for Sri Lanka’s Resurgence’. The forum will feature a diverse lineup of more than ten speakers hailing from renowned global companies such as Meta, Google, LinkedIn, and more. The event will offer three separate breakout rooms for interactive sessions and attendees will have the opportunity to delve into real-life case studies, specifically focusing on examples from Sri Lanka and the region. The speakers will actively interact with the participants by conducting engaging Q&A sessions and offering personalised feedback on their ideas.

Umair Wolid, President of the Digital Marketing Association of Sri Lanka, commented on this event, “We are thrilled to provide Sri Lankan marketers with the valuable experience and expertise of internationally acclaimed digital marketers. We have full confidence that the insights and knowledge shared at this event will empower all participants to achieve remarkable success in their marketing endeavours. As a result, this collective growth will contribute to positioning Sri Lanka as a prominent global player in the digital marketing industry.”

Expressing her views, Ashani Senaratne, General Manager, Marketing of Dialog Axiata PLC said, “As the Title Sponsor, Dialog is committed to supporting and nurturing the digital media industry in Sri Lanka.”
